alert.note: Alert for New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New Madrid County through 530 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarkton, or near Campbell, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gideon around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Parma and Risco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri.
